option.name: METHOD_NAME
option.value: test jumpToChapter() prevents changing without user confirmation

option.name: METHOD_NAME
option.value: test jumpToChapter() requests playback for correct track

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Uncommitted changes before Merge at 4/24/21 6:55 AM [Default Changelist]

task.summary: Bug fixes for 0.42.3. Downloads persist across library changes, better support for multi-track playback, and minor bugfixes
Remove casting code from develop branch
Increased audio buffer in both directions
Updated documentation
Bugfix: Remote progress called more consistently
Returns failure messages for finished downloads in CachedFileManager
Bugfix: seeking/skipping/jumping inaccuracy resolved for multi-track books
Added toggle to settings for shake to snooze
Bugfix: config change no longer overrides navigation state. navigation state now posts as an event
Collapse empty string tag
Beta 0.42.2 release candidate
Ensuring offline playback works without connection to server
Refactoring to use multiple sources
Added shrinkResources to build.gradle
Handle wired headphones pause/play
Remove empty file
Possible fix to 90% issue
Increase book title maxLines to 2 lines
Added alternative view styles for library screenma
Prevent changes to books db from causing library screen to scroll to top
Prevent network changes from force-starting playback
Fix uncloseable, empty notifications after playback has finished
August 11th update
Refactoring to SourceManager.kt pt 3. Basic playback with Plex working, demo in broken state
Refactoring to use ExoPlayer's built-in download manager. Downlaods work but cannot play them back
Beta release 0.44
Basic working version of DownloadManager removal. Missing: handling of edge cases like download errors (not currently communicated to user)
Update TODO for version 0.50
Updated code style
v0.45: Downloader updates + some extra junk
Add animated vector for force-sync
Beta update 0.45.0
Rename FlowableRadioGroupExt.kt to ChipGroupExt.kt
Fixed crash on reselection of view/sort item
Fix completed books not appearing as completed
Expanded size of currently playing album art. Disappeared it in landscape mode to make controls more obvious
Prevent tracks from decoupling from their downloaded tracks on ID change
Update current chapter/track metadata on track change, improve CurrentlyPlayingSingleton.kt interface
Fixed media disappearing, made 'mark as watched' available even if media is not started
Prevent service from being restarted when system kills at low memory
Notification controls track playback state properly
WIP: merge in stash
Migrating audiobooks to use server IDs. WIP not functional
Fix service fails to restart after process death

Updates for open source release
Add README, LICENSE GPLv3, and instructions for contributing in CONTRIBUTING.md
Update .gitignore to ignore all files in .idea

Clean up todo.md
Long-term planning to offload this to GitHub issues. With maybe a far more zoomed out "roadmap" somewhere
Update .gitignore + gradle plugin
Fix images in README.md
